template<typename BoundType , typename StatisticType = EmptyStatistic, typename MatType = arma::mat, typename SplitType = MeanSplit<BoundType, MatType>>
template<typename RuleType >
void mlpack::tree::BinarySpaceTree< BoundType, StatisticType, MatType, SplitType >::DualTreeTraverser< RuleType >::Traverse ( BinarySpaceTree &  queryNode,
BinarySpaceTree &  referenceNode 
)

Traverse the two trees.

This does not reset the number of prunes.

Parameters:
queryNode The query node to be traversed.
referenceNode The reference node to be traversed.
score The score of the current node combination.
